name: VšĮ Žmogaus teisių balsas
goal: Human rights voice Lithuania is a non-governmental, non-profit organization that unites human rights activists that want to educate people on human rights issues, improve the understanding of specific issues of certain social groups and to encourage the growth of democratic institutions and organizations.
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Fraud prevention, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: We're interested in all initiatives that fit into these areas: borders and security; consumers; culture and media; social affairs; education; security policy; migration; human rights and others.
